title: Feed select Modal: Final Game State
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps:
WHEN the user Selects an Archived game to watch 
AND show the feed select modal appears
custom_expected:
THEN the user can choose between available video feeds, Recap, or Condensed feeds
AND the user can play back the Recap
AND the user can play back the condensed feed
AND the user can play back the available video feeds

title: No Feeds available/Postponed Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps:
WHEN the user Selects a postponed game or other game without feeds to watch 
AND the feed select modal appears
custom_expected: THEN the user should see messaging that states there are "No Broadcasts Available"

title: statsapi failure (automated)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a game tile on the homepage or games page
AND calls to statsapi fail (this can be simulated by adding https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=* to Block List on Charles with Drop connection Blocking action selected)
custom_expected: THEN the feed select modal will display the following message: "Sorry, an error occurred retrieving game data. Please try again."

title: Feed Select: Postponed & Suspended Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game was Postponed on the selected date (for the example below, use 05/13/2024)
AND the user selects the game tile
Example game from 2024:
Postponed WSH @CWS postponed on 05/13/2024 resumed 05/14/2024
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the "No Broadcasts Available" modal displays

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game was Postponed on a previous day and is being resumed on the selected date(for the example, use 05/13/2024)
AND the user selects the game tile
Example game from 2024:
Postponed WSH @CWS postponed on 05/13/2024 resumed 05/14/2024
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the available feeds for that date display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game was Suspended on the selected date (for the example below, use 08/27/2024)
AND the user selects the game tile
Example game from 2024:
Suspended TEX @ CWS suspended on 08/27/2024 resumed 08/28/2024
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN two separate feeds (one for the first part of the game and one for the completion of the game) will display for each feed if the suspended game starts or is completed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN  game was Suspended on a previous day and is being resumed on the selected date (for the example below, use 08/27/2024)
AND the user selects the game tile
Example game from 2024:
Suspended TEX @ CWS suspended on 08/27/2024 resumed 08/28/2024
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN two separate feeds (one for the first part of the game and one for the completion of the game) will display for each feed if the suspended game starts or is completed

title: FeedSelect: Blackout Feed select Modal (automated)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps: WHEN the game is blacked out for the user
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a black out message and no feeds

title: Launch Youtube Game of the Week
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
NOTE: YouTube game can be simulated in the app by proxying https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached json file

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I select the Youtube option on the feed select modal for a Youtube free game of the week
AND I do not have YouTube installed
NOTE: On some Android TV devices it is not possible to remove YouTube app from the device, so this step should be marked as "Not applicable" for such devices.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I will be redirected the the App Store and presented with the option to get the Youtube app
NOTE: Proxy must be turned off in order to access the Play or Amazon store page for the YouTube app.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I select the Youtube option on the feed select modal for a Youtube free game of the week
AND I do have YouTube installed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Youtube app will open and the feed will play in Youtube

title: Blackouts- Feed Level
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing feeds

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a feed is Video and not blacked out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN all video feeds are Blacked out

NOTE: To simulate the conditions for this test case, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search*	with the attached mastapi_blackout_simulated_in_hero.json. You should be able to test the hero on the homepage and the game tiles on the games page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render the blackout messages

title: Check entitlements and MVPD
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is viewing feeds 
AND is not logged in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see "Upgrade MLB.TV"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is viewing feeds
AND a feed is Video
AND the user is entitled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is viewing feeds
AND all video feeds are not entitled and at least one requires MVPD
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render the MVPD message for that feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is viewing feeds
AND all video feeds are not entitled
AND none are MVPD
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN render lock icons and upgrade button

title: Feed selected too early
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps:
WHEN the user Selects a future game to watch 
AND show the feedselect modal appears
custom_expected: THEN the user should see messaging that states You’re a bit too early

title: SVOD modal- logged in user without entitlements purchase flow
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user without entitlements

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they click on an SVOD/SLIVE piece of content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will see a modal asking them to Upgrade MLB TV

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is presented with the modal asking them to Upgrade MLB TV
AND the user completes a purchase
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will be redirected to the video

title: SVOD modal- logged out user- general navigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN an a logged out user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they click on an SVOD/SLIVE piece of content
AND then successfully log in from the modal
AND are entitled to watch the content
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be returned to the homepage with proper entitlements
AND SVOD video should be playable

NOTE: This is the current expected behavior. The desired behavior in upcoming work is:

THEN they should return directly into the video content

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they click on an SVOD/SLIVE piece of content
AND they choose "Get MLB.TV"
AND then successfully purchase a subscription
AND they create an account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be returned to the homepage with proper entitlements
AND SVOD video should be playable
NOTE: This is the current expected behavior. The desired behavior in upcoming work is:

THEN they should return directly into the video content

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they click on an SVOD/SLIVE piece of content
AND then successfully log in from the modal
AND are not entitled to watch the content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should be presented with a screen providing option to "Upgrade MLB.TV"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the screen providing options to "Upgrade MLB.TV"
AND the user selects "Upgrade MLB.TV"
AND the user makes a purchase
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should return into the video content

title: SVOD modal- logged out user- Purchase through modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged out user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they click on an SVOD/SLIVE piece of content AND they choose "Get MLB.TV"
 AND then successfully purchase a subscription 
AND they create an account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be returned to the homepage with proper entitlements 
AND SVOD video should be playable
NOTE: This is the current expected behavior. The desired behavior in upcoming work is:

THEN they should return directly into the video content

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they click on an SVOD/SLIVE piece of content
AND then successfully log in from the modal
AND are not entitled to watch the content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should be presented with a screen providing options to "Upgrade MLB.TV" or "Exit"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the screen providing options to "Upgrade MLB.TV" or "Exit"
AND the user selects "Upgrade MLB.TV"
AND the user makes a purchase
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should return into the video content

title: Browse for Free User: Feed Select Modal Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Non-logged in MLB.tv user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select game tile for a game that has a feed available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a feed picker opens with options to get access to the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the feed select modal
AND the user selects the log in button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THE the login page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the feed select modal
AND the user selects the Get MLB.TV button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the paywall is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the feed select modal for an archived game
AND free content is available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is presented with the free options (Condensed Game and Recap)
AND the user will be able to watch the free video without an account (the condensed and recap videos only)

title: Free Users: MLB Free Game of the day modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Non-logged in MLB.tv user
NOTE: This test case is written for the updated feed select. Delete this comment after updated feed select is toggled on.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select a live MLB.TV Free game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a feed picker opens with options to Log in or Create a Free Account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select an Archived MLB.TV Free game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND VOD Content is available
THEN a feed picker opens with options to watch condensed game / recap or Log in or Create a Free Account

title: Default to User's Favorite Team
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user is in MLB.TV App

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user Selects their Favorite team’s game to watch 
AND the feed select modal appears
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user’s cursor should default to their favorite team’s Video feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user Selects their Following team’s game to watch 
AND the feed select modal appears
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user’s cursor should default to their Following team’s Video feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user Selects a non-Favorite or following team’s game to watch 
AND the feed select modal appears
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user’s cursor should default to their first feed available

title: Logged in Free User: Feed Select Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in MLB.tv user
AND the user is not entitled
 
NOTE: When "Break Glass" mode is enabled, all feeds will return as entitled. In this case, users will NOT see the expected behaviors. If you are not sure if break glass mode is enabled, please inquire for clarification. In this case, users will instead will see this:
WHEN the user selects the un-entitled game feed
AND chooses a playback option
THEN "You do not have access to play this game" message is presented to the user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select a live game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a feed picker opens an option to Upgrade MLB.TV

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select upgrade mlb.tv
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I’m taken to the paywall page

title: No Broadcasts available
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user
custom_steps:
WHEN they select the game tile of a feed with no broadcasts available
NOTE: This can include postponed games (eg BAL @ BOS on April 1, 2021) and Spring Training games with no feeds (eg KC @ TEX on February 23, 2024)
custom_expected: THEN a feed select modal displays with the message "No Broadcasts Available There are no broadcasts available for this game."

title: Archived game-Resume Options
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a feed from an archived game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will begin playing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user leaves the archived feed
AND selects a feed from the same game again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal will be presented with options to "Resume" or "Watch From The Beginning"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "Resume" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play from the bookmarked position

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "Watch From The Beginning" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play from the beginning

title: Live Game- Resume Options
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a live feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be presented with options to "Watch Live" or "Watch From The Beginning"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "Watch Live" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play from the live point

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "Watch from Beginning" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play from the beginning

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user leaves a feed after playing
AND the user selects a feed from the same game again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be presented with options to "Resume", "Watch Live", or  "Watch From The Beginning"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the "Resume" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play from the bookmarked position

title: YouTube Pregame State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user


NOTE: YoutTube games are usually scheduled on Wednesdays. Look to a future Wendnesday on the Games page for a YouTube game to test with. If that is not possible (as in offseason it likely will be), to create the correct conditions to simulate this state, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the mastapi_youtube_pregame_in_tiles.json  file available at this link (too large to attach) AFTV: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sawfuvFUafMk4cju4rCV3-wG7hGQzRuR/view?usp=sharing
AND proxy https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=634641&hydrate=broadcasts%28all%29%2Cteam%2Cgame%28content%28media%28epg%29%29%29%2Clinescore%28%29&useLatestGames=false with the attached statsapi_youtube_pregame_in_tiles_feed_select.json (The date of the game will need be updated over time in these files, or the "No Broadcasts Available" feed will display once past the game date)
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a YouTube Game
AND the game is in a pregame state
AND there are no active feeds available
custom_expected: THEN the "You're a bit early!" modal should be displayed

title: YouTube Live State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user


NOTE: to create the correct conditions to simulate this state, proxy	https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the mastapi_youtube_live_game_in_tiles.json 
available at this link (too large to attach) https://drive.google.com/file/d/16rOH9NsAYppWRHjhvK_sLZfLMF-YoSak/view?usp=sharing
and 

https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=634641&hydrate=broadcasts%28all%29%2Cteam%2Cgame%28content%28media%28epg%29%29%29%2Clinescore%28%29&useLatestGames=false with the attached statsapi_youtube_live_game_in_tiles_feed_select.json
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a YouTube Game
AND the game is in a live state
custom_expected: THEN the user should be presented with the "Open YouTube" modal

title: YouTube Archived State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

NOTE: A real archived game should be available on Sept 8, 2021, Seattle at Houston. This game can be accessed to run this test case.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user selects a YouTube Game
AND the game is in an archived state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be presented with a standard archived game modal (YouTube will be listed as the broadcaster call letters)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is presented with the archived game modal
ANS the user is entitled
AND the user selects the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game should play inside the MLB app

title: Apple TV pregame
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

NOTE: Apple Games are usually scheduled on Fridays. Look to a future Friday on the Games page for an Apple TV game in pregame state. If this is not possible (as will likely be the case in the offseason), to simulate the conditions for this test case, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_appletv_pregame_in_tiles.json file available at this link(file too large to attach): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pmGtMt37zp5rS1l1S0TxN7rl26k-R5aY/view?usp=sharing
AND proxy true	https://statsapi.mlb.com:443/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=634641&hydrate=broadcasts%28all%29%2Cteam%2Cgame%28content%28media%28epg%29%29%29%2Clinescore%28%29&useLatestGames=false	with the attached statsapi_search_appletv_pregame_in_feed_select.json
custom_steps:
WHEN an Apple + game is available in the game tiles
AND the game is pregame (the stream is not yet available)
AND the user selects the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Apple + game is available in the game tiles
AND the game is pregame (the stream is not yet available)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an Apple TV+ pill should display on the tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal should indicate that the user is too early or that no broadcasts are available

title: Apple TV live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

NOTE: to simulate the conditions for this test case, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_appletv_live_game_in_tiles.json file available at this link(file too large to attach): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fbv72ec2-4u95d9rp-9IK1qGjDzF-THz/view?usp=sharing
AND proxy true https://statsapi.mlb.com:443/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=634641&hydrate=broadcasts%28all%29%2Cteam%2Cgame%28content%28media%28epg%29%29%29%2Clinescore%28%29&useLatestGames=false with the attached statsapi_search_appletv_live_game_in_feed_select.json

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is available in the game tiles
AND the game is in a live state
AND the user selects the game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the modal shows Apple TV+ specific messaging
AND a selectable feed is available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the selectable feed
AND the user is in a blacked out country
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will redirect to the player
AND Apple specific blackout messaging will be presented

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the selectable feed
AND the user is in a non-blacked out country
(a location spoofed account for France or the Dominican Republic will work to test this test case)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play

title: Apple TV archived
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

NOTE: Go to May 20, 2022 on the Games page and select the Saint Louis at Pittsburgh game to run this test case.
custom_steps:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is available in the game tiles
AND the game is in an archived state
AND the user selects the game
custom_expected:
THEN the feed is presented as a standard archived game (No badge will be presented on the game tile, but the feed will be listed as "Apple TV+" in the feed select modal)
AND an entitled user will be able to stream the game inside the app

title: Pregame Show Feed select modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND a game with a live pregame show is currently available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user clicks the game tile
AND selects a feed with a live pregame show
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a modal will pop up with Watch Live and Watch From The Beginning options
AND these buttons will function as expected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user leaves the pregame show
AND then returns to the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a modal will pop up with Resume, Watch Live, and Watch From The Beginning options
AND these buttons will function as expected
